DOC.brief_summary: This is a extended long-term safety study in Parkinson's disease patients who have motor response complications on levodopa therapy and completed 12 weeks administrations of KW-6500 in 6500-004 study. The safety and efficacy of long-term subcutaneous self-injections of KW-6500 are evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Extended Long-Term Safety Study of KW-6500
DOC.criteria: Patients who have given written informed consent Patients who have completed the 6500004 study
